sentences.en: "Welcome back" was all they said. I could have kissed them!
sentences.cn: 他们只是说，“欢迎回来。”我真想亲他们一下！

sentences.en: A tumultuous welcome from a 2,000 strong crowd greeted the champion.
sentences.cn: 多达2,000名群众热烈欢迎冠军。

sentences.en: Any progress in reducing chemical weapons is welcome.
sentences.cn: 削减化学武器的任何进展都是受人欢迎的。

sentences.en: Customers are welcome to linger over coffee until around midnight.
sentences.cn: 客人尽可以喝着咖啡逗留到午夜左右。

sentences.en: Environmental groups have given a guarded welcome to the Prime Minister's proposal.
sentences.cn: 环保组织对首相的提议表示谨慎的欢迎.

sentences.en: His family welcomed me with open arms (= in a very friendly way ).
sentences.cn: 他的家人热情友好地欢迎我。

sentences.en: Hospital staff were outside to welcome him, waving flags and applauding.
sentences.cn: 医院的工作人员都在外面一边挥动旗子一边鼓掌欢迎他。

sentences.en: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.en: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.en: I must be there to welcome my guests.
sentences.cn: 我必须在那里迎接我的客人。

sentences.en: I told him he wasn't welcome in my home.
sentences.cn: 我告诉他我家不欢迎他。

sentences.en: I welcome the report as a herald of more freedom, not less.
sentences.cn: 我认为这份报告预示着会有更多、而不是更少的自由，因此对它表示欢迎。

sentences.en: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.cn: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.en: Mary says you're welcome to stay the night if you want.
sentences.cn: 玛丽说如果你愿意，可以在这儿呆一宿。

sentences.en: New members are always welcome.
sentences.cn: 随时欢迎新成员加入。

sentences.en: No matter how often they turn up, their welcome never wears out.
sentences.cn: 不管他们多久露面一次，都永远那么受欢迎。

sentences.en: The students gave him a rapturous welcome.
sentences.cn: 学生们欢天喜欢地迎接他。

sentences.en: They welcomed us warmly.
sentences.cn: 他们热烈欢迎我们。

sentences.en: They would no doubt welcome the action with open arms.
sentences.cn: 他们无疑将热烈欢迎这一举动。

sentences.en: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.cn: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

sentences.en: We would welcome your views about the survey.
sentences.cn: 我们欢迎你就这项调查发表意见。

sentences.en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
sentences.cn: 你可以随时来医院。

phrases.tran_cn: （来访者）因呆得太久而不再受欢迎
来访过密或呆得太久而变得令人讨厌
欢迎搭乘（飞机、火车、轮船等）；欢迎加入
欢迎会，欢迎宴会；迎新会
欢迎来中国；中国欢迎您
［用于礼貌地回答别人的感谢］别客气，不用谢

trans.tran_cn: 受欢迎的，令人愉快的，可随意…的，尽管…好了
trans.tran_en: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

trans.tran_cn: 欢迎〔用于对刚刚到达的人表示欢迎〕
trans.tran_en: the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
